tit.j: 七条警察署巡査殺害事件
tit.e: The Case of the Murder of a Shichijo Police Constable
The Case of the Murder of a Shichijo Police Constable

sen.j: 七条警察署巡査殺害事件（しちじょうけいさつしょじゅんささつがいじけん）とは、1946年（昭和21年）6月9日に京都府京都市で発生した殺人事件。
sen.e: The case of the murder of a Shichijo Police constable is a homicide that occurred on June 9, 1946 in Kyoto City.
The case of the murder of a Shichijo Police constable is a homicide that occurred on June 9, 1946 in Kyoto City.
The case of the murder of a Shichijo Police constable is a homicide that occurred on June 9, 1946 in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1946年6月9日未明、パトロール中の七条警察署の巡査が、不審人物5人を発見し職務質問をしようとしたところ、中の1人から突然発砲された。
sen.e: A constable from the Shichijo Police station, who was making his rounds in the early hours of June 9, 1946, saw five suspicious people, and when he tried to question them, was shot by one of them.

sen.j: 巡査は警笛を鳴らして追跡したが、弾は巡査の左胸部に命中しており、まもなく力尽きて倒れこんだ。
sen.e: The constable blew his police whistle and ran after them, but soon collapsed to the ground as he had been shot in his left chest.

sen.j: 巡査は駆けつけた署員に犯人の特徴を詳細に述べた後、直ちに進駐軍用救急車で病院に運ばれたが、同日午前3時5分に死亡した。
sen.e: After giving descriptions of the suspects to a police officer who ran to the scene, he was immediately taken to a hospital in an ambulance for the occupation forces but died at 3:05 that morning.

sen.j: 京都府警察部は、直ちに捜査を開始し、犯人の朝鮮人5人を逮捕した。
sen.e: Kyoto Police immediately began a search and arrested five Koreans.
